Error Code BMCR19
Error Code 19
Category: BMCR
Title: BMCR19
Alarm Message: Perforation Low Temperature
Description: Actual temperature is lower than set low band limit. (Low Band limit = Set temperature - Low band)
Reason & Remedy:
1. The temperature of the perforation heater is low (15 0C less than the set temperature).
2. Check the temperature which is set for the perforation heater.
3. Check the band value set for the perforation heater.
4. Parameters re OK but temperature not risnig.
5. Check if themocouple is connected to perforation heater plate properly.
6. Check if thermocouple and heater supply connector are connected.
7. Check if the SSR is switching on.
8. Check if Contactor is on.
9. Check the heater connection and check voltage during on condition at SSR output and Junction
10. Box.
11. Check heater resistance
12. PID parameters.
13. Check if the deafult PID parameters are shown on machine as per below image.
